etphoneshome.entities.characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • etphoneshome.entities.actor.Actor
      • etphoneshome.entities.characters.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ET

    public abstract class Character
extends Actor
    This is used for a generic character (non-enemy) class. It is derived from the Actor class.
